message: Let's be fair, Bob.  I take a bit more, since I'm making the first offer.
Let's split things a bit more evenly, Alice. Remember, the clock is ticking!
The money's losing value, Bob. Let's settle this - my last offer was more than fair!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair option. Take it before we both lose out!
